item.description: Let's face it - it is an important ability at times.

item.title: [+1356] A Brutal Reminder Life Isn't Fair (PIC)
item.description: This guy got to take a picture in a crowd of hot Slave Leias, and you didn't.

item.title: [+1311] Cats Don't Care WTF (Pic)
[+1099] Girl Jailed, Acted as 'Honey Trap,' Luring Boy to His Death
item.description: A schoolgirl who acted as a honey trap to lure a besotted boy to his death at the hands of a masked gang was jailed for a minimum of ten years yesterday.The six gang members were sentenced to a total of 77 years. The gang and its leader had all denied murder but were given life sentences after being convicted following a ten-week trial.

item.title: [+1062] Mystery solved! Why Google used a UFO on its search engine
item.description: The website featured the classic image of a flying saucer shining a beam of light onto the middle of the classic logo.

item.title: [+950] Call of Duty 4: Galactic Warfare Trailer [Mod]
item.description: Here's an awesome mod for Modern Warfare called Galactic Warfare, featuring characters from Star Wars.

item.title: [+878] Top 10 Anime movies that surpass Disney by lightyears
item.description: Ten anime movies that surpass virtually anything Disney has made, including the Pixar films.

item.title: [+796] Nerd Venn Diagram
item.description: Are you a nerd, geek, or a dork?

item.title: [+743] The Japanese Need To Stop The Massacre Of The Dolphins!
item.description: At the heart of a Japanese nature reserve, a horror story is unfolding. Over the coming months, thousands of dolphins - some only a few days old - will be hacked to death.

item.title: [+715] Van Jones Resigns
item.description: Obama aide Van Jones resigns as environmental adviser amid controversy over past statements.

item.title: [+677] Charles Darwin And The Tree Of Life [Video]
item.description: BBC's Darwin season featured 'Charles Darwin and the Tree of Life' - an animation which illustrates an idea that Darwin and his contemporaries used to explain the evolutionary links between living things. This amazing animation was narrated by Sir David Attenborough.

item.title: [+629] Insane Item Abuse Super Mario World Speedrun
item.description: Before complaints start, yes, it's a Tool Assisted speedrun. Yes, it's still pretty freakin' insane, even for a TAS, and I'd like to see you do better.

item.title: [+585] Pirates Jump on District 9 Torrents
item.description: With over a million downloads in less than 24 hours, Peter Jackson’s Sci-Fi thriller District 9 is well on its way to becoming the most pirated movie of 2009. The huge download spike is caused by a DVD quality version of the movie that leaked onto various BitTorrent sites yesterday.

item.title: [+576] 5 girls strip-searched at school
item.description: School officials in Atlantic forced five teenage girls to take off their clothing for a search after a classmate reported $100 missing from her purse. Atlantic's superintendent calls the action 'allowable.'

item.title: [+548] Mac OS X Snow Leopard: The Complete Guide
item.description: Though you might mistake Snow Leopard for plain old Leopard when you first boot it up, there's a lot of subtle stuff happening on screen and under the hood. Here's our guide to everything new in the latest Mac OS.

item.title: [+528] Some people have no vision
[+505] Florida Republican Chair politicizes school, attacks Obama
item.description: There once was a political operative who loved to tell crowds he had a simple way of explaining to children the difference between Republicans and Democrats. That man is Jim Greer who, as chairman of the Republican Party of Florida, claimed school is no place for politics and Obama’s “indoctrination.” Ah..jokes about Hillary Clinton to schoolkids.

item.title: [+486] A 250 lb. Vegan in the National Football League?
item.description: Another NFL season is upon us but what can the red meat macho world of pro football offer an earth-friendly greenie? How about a lesson in eco-eating from Atlanta Falcons Tight End Tony Gonzalez? In 2008—his first meat-free season—Gonzalez stuck to his diet and broke two major records for his position. "I was like, 'OK, this is working,'" he said.
